item.title: Lauseenvastikkeet: Kirjoita
item.description: Muuta lauseenvastikkeiksi. 1. Before you apply for a visa, you should consider the following things. =   for a visa, you should consider the following things. 2. As he was anxious to get away, he drove all through the night. = , he drove all through the night. 3. In the morning he reached the cottage which stood by the lake. = In the morning he reached the cottage .
